channel.title: How do i add clans?
channel.description: okay ive had a server with [u]clans[/u] before, where you type ::createclan ::makeclan ect.. i dont have that on my server....what codes do i have to add and where do i put them to make [u]clans [/u] work??? [b]thanks for you time and help![/b]

item.title: How do i add clans?
item.dc:creator: @hunterjbradford hunterjbradford
item.description:
@hunterjbradford wrote:

okay ive had a server with clans before, where you type ::createclan ::makeclan ect… i dont have that on my server…what codes do i have to add and where do i put them to make clans work???
thanks for you time and help!
